College_Summary: Banarsidas Chandiwala Institute Of Professional Studies was established in the year 2008. It is affiliated to Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University (GGSIPU) and approved by AICTE. The Institute offers its flagship course BBA at the UG level and MBA at the PG level. Admission to MBA is done on the basis of valid scores in CAT/IPUCET followed by online counselling. Admissions to BBA is based on valid scores in IPU CET conducted by GGSIPU. Scholarships on the basis of Merit cum means, to economically weaker sections and to minor communities. Apart from this scholarship from Shri Banarsidas Chandiwala Sewa Smarak Trust Society is also provided to the students. Some of the top recruiters that recruit BCIPS students include TCS, Accenture, Genpact and Trident among various others.

College_Summary: Institute of Advanced Management and Research (IAMR), Ghaziabad was established in the year 2000. The institute comes under the aegis of IAMR Group of Institutions. The institute offers an MBA program in the discipline of HR, IT, Marketing, Finance and many more. Admission is done on the basis of CAT/MAT/XAT/UPSEE scores. IAMR has a training and placement cell that provides 100% placement assistance to its students. Some of the students get placed in top companies like MRF, American Express, Ambuja Cement, Accenture, LG and many more.

College_Name: Institute of Marketing and Management, Delhi
College_Summary: Institute of Marketing & Management (IMM), Delhi was established in 1969  and is celebrating 54 years of excellence which is at par with only a selective few reputed B schools in India. IMM, Delhi offers degree and postgraduate diploma course in the discipline of Management. IMM has Won 6 Awards of Excellence for Innovative Practices. The institute offers PGDM Program with dual Specialization infused with Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. IMM‘s PGDM is focused on three inter-related areas: academic merit, personal values and social concerns. The two-year, full time, Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) is approved by All India Institute of Technical Education (AICTE), Ministry of Education, GOI. IMM also offers multiple summer internships to its students. Admission to PGDM is based on valid CAT/ MAT/ XAT/ ATMA/ CMAT/ IMM scores.

College_Name: Institute of Productivity and Management - [IPM], Meerut
College_Summary: Institute of Productivity and Management Business Management is considered on the most demanded courses in the contemporary scenario of the world, in the field of infrastructure, manufacture, environment, sustainable economy, real estate, retail, IT, ITeS, finance, production, inventory management, warehousing, etc. Institute of Productivity and Management Meerut is proliferating knowledge in the field of management and productivity, to augment entrepreneurial propensity and business skills. Located near the NCR region of Delhi, it has the advantage of being exposed to the prominent industries and companies. With the placement record of 90 per cent since ten years, this college is the first management institute in UP to receive state government recognition.

College_Summary: Rukmini Devi Institute of Advanced Studies (RDIAS) is accredited with ‘A+’ grade by NAAC (National Assessment and Accreditation Council). RDIAS is a Category ‘A+’ Institute judged by SFRC (State Fee Regulatory Committee), Govt of NCT of Delhi. The Institute has been awarded the highest Category ‘A’ grading by the joint Assessment Committee of GGSIPU and the Department of Higher Education, Govt. of NCT of Delhi. The institute is an ISO 9001:2015 Certified Institute. RDIAS has been rated as the Best Management College in Delhi, offering both undergraduate and postgraduate courses with a total of 360 seats in BBA program and 240 seats in MBA program. Therefore, RDIAS ranks among the top BBA college in IP university and is the best MBA college in Delhi. Our focus lies on being the best, and to stand by this vision, we are engaged in many academic and industrial collaborations such as ASSOCHAM,DMA, CEGR,CII, AMDISA NHRDN and several others.

It focuses on attaining the best possible heights in terms of quality education and works with an aim of providing holistic education to its students. It makes the best efforts to make sure that the progress of the students is not limited to their classrooms. In order to have an edge over its counterparts, it emphasizes on the overall development of the students by maintaining a perfect balance of academics and co-curricular activities. It is located in a lush green campus spanning over 200 acres and is surrounded by various institutes providing different types of courses. It boasts of a record of getting its students placed in top MNCs and national companies. Being located in the NCR region, the students get an opportunity to interact with some of the biggest corporations. Its idea is to nurture the young talents of today so that they can create history in the future.

National Institute of Educational Planning and Administration - [NIEPA], New Delhi
College_Summary: National Institute of Educational Planning and Administration (NIEPA), New Delhi was established in the year 1962 by Ministry of Human Resource Development, Government of India as a UNESCO Regional Centre and developed into status of University in 2006. It is approved by University Grants Commission (UGC). It is located on Sri Aurobindo Marg, in South of New Delhi opposite Qutub Hotel, adjoining to NCERT and Indian Institute of Technology Campuses.

College_Name: Central Sanskrit University
College_Summary: Central Sanskrit University, formerly Rashtriya Sanskrit Sansthan, is a central university located in New Delhi, India for the promotion of Sanskrit. Founded in 1970, it serves under the Ministry of Human Resource Development, Government of India, and is also accredited with a grade ‘A’ by NAAC. In March 2020, the Parliament of India passed the Central Sanskrit Universities Act, 2020 to upgrade it from deemed to be university status to central university status, along with two other universities National Sanskrit University and Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri National Sanskrit University. The University also offers courses through Distance Mode. Check  Central Sanskrit University Distance Education

College_Name: Baba Mastnath University (BMU)
College_Summary: Baba Mastnath University Rohtak was established in 2010. The university is recognized by the University Grants Commission under the support of Shri Baba Mastnath Math, Asthal Bohar. It offers 32 various courses in the domain of Arts, Commerce, and Science (Medical, Non-Medical, and Engineering). The admission of these courses is based on the merit obtained by the applicant in the last qualifying exams. However for Medical courses, the candidates' merit will be based on the NEET entrance marks and for Ph.D. applicants, a separate entrance test is conducted by BMU itself. The forms of application are available in online mode. BMU provides internship programs and real-life projects for medical courses.

Additionally, it also offers an MBA Executive Program on a weekend basis. The school, within a short period, has developed itself as a unique and progressive school with its distinct curriculum and innovative teaching methodology. The School was previously located at the Kasmere Gate Campus of the University. It has now shifted to the Main Campus of Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University at Dwarka. USMS, IPU is ranked 66th in the Management Category by NIRF Ranking 2023. It has also been ranked 14th in the Outlook iCare B-School Rankings 2023. Admission to MBA is based on CAT/ CMAT/ IPU CET scores.

The design institute is accredited by the Fashion Design Council of India (FDCI) and other prominent design education regulatory bodies such as IIID, CII, ADI, and IFFTI. IIAD conducts iDAT and iMAT entrance examinations to offer admission to the design aspirants. IIAD Delhi also offers lateral entry admissions to students who have completed at least one year of design degree or diploma from a recognized institute.

College_Summary: Asian Business School (ABS) is an AICTE approved, NBA-accredited, and AIU-affiliated private institute located in Noida which works under the aegis of the renowned Asian Education Group. The college has been ranked amongst the Top 10 Business Schools of India by The Knowledge Review magazine and ranked 6th in A++ category B School of India by Silicon India. It has been awarded as ‘Business School of the Year’ by The Academic Insights. The college is visited by over 300 recruiters every year and provides an opportunity of a one-week residential educational trip to Oxford Business College, Oxford, U.K. Its Board of Directors include prominent names like Sandeep Marwah, Anil Kapoor (Actor) and Boney Kapoor (Film Producer).

College_Summary: New Delhi Institute of Management was established in 1992 and approved by AICTE and is affiliated to GGSIPU. The institute offers the flagship course of BBA. It is offered in two shifts. Admission to the course offered by the institute will be based on the candidate’s performance in their rank in IPU CET conducted by GGSIP University and the counseling.

College_Summary: New Delhi Institute of Management, established in 1992, is affiliated to Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University and approved by AICTE and Govt. of Delhi. The college offers various undergraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Commerce, Management, and Computer Application.

The Institute is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and was established in the year 2003. Two year full-time PGDM program is the only course offered by the institute. Admission to the PGDM course will be done on the basis of scores obtained in CAT/ MAT/ XAT/ CMAT Entrance Exam.

College_Name: Subharti Medical College
College_Summary: Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose Subharti Medical College, popularly referred to as Subharti Medical College, is one of the finest medical colleges in Northern India established in 1996 in Meerut, Uttar Pradesh. Subharti Medical College is affiliated with Swami Vivekanand Subharti University, Meerut. The college is recognized by the Medical Council of India (MCI) and has collaborations with prestigious medical organizations all over the world. Subharti Medical College offers UG, PG, Doctoral, Diploma, and Certificate courses in the field of Medicine.

SLS Noida
College_Summary: Symbiosis Law School, Noida is a constituent of Symbiosis International (Deemed University) and was established in 2010. SLS provides UG and PG courses in Law. Candidates aspiring to join B.A LL.B. / B.B.A LL.B offered by Institute should appear for the Symbiosis Law Admission Test (SLAT) exam conducted by the institute itself and for the LL.M course candidates have to take the common, mandatory All India Admission Test (AIAT). The short-listed candidates from the above exams will then be invited for a Personal Interview (PI) via Online Mode.

College_Name: International Institute Of Fashion Technology ( IIFT ) - New Delhi
College_Summary: International Institute of Fashion Technology, New Delhi is a private institute, awarded Quality Initiative Mission Educational Leadership Award 2013 in the Field of Fashion. The institute offers 3 months and 6 months certification courses in Fashion Designing, Interior Designing and Garment Marketing. In addition to this, the International Institute of Fashion Technology also offers Diploma and Advanced Diploma courses in Fashion Designing and Interior Designing. Check: IIFT Courses and Fees

College_Name: Sh. L.N Hindu College, Rohtak
College_Summary: Sh.L.N.Hindu college, Rohtak is a private institute established in 1971. It is managed by Hindu Education society, Rohtak and is affiliated to M.D.University(Rohtak). The institute is accredited with NAAC Grade B and a score of 2.7 and is also approved by AICTE.

College_Name: Periyar Management and Computer College, New Delhi
College_Summary: Periyar Management and Computer College, also known as PMCC, was established in the year 2013 by Periyar Self Respect Propaganda Institution (PSRPI) in New Delhi, Delhi NCR. The college is accredited by AICTE and affiliated to Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University (GGSIPU). It offers a course on MBA.

College_Name: Sirifort Institute of Management Studies, New Delhi
College_Summary: Sirifort Institute of Management Studies established in 1999, is a private university located in Rohini, New Delhi. The institute offers a variety of full-time UG courses such as B.com, BCA & BBA. The minimum eligibility required to apply for admission at the institute is 50% aggregate marks in 10+2 in any discipline. The admission to various courses is provided through a Common Entrance Test (IPU-CET) and through Management quota. Graduates from SIMS New Delhi are placed in top-notch companies such as Infosys, Tech Mahindra, Grofers, Accenture, Wipro, etc.

College_Name: Delhi Teacher Training College - [DTTC], New Delhi
Guru Ram Das College of Education - [GRDCE], New Delhi
College_Summary: Guru Ram Das College of Education, New Delhi, one of the emerging institutes under the Delhi Sikh gurdwara management committee was established in 2006, Situated in Kardam Marg, New Delhi.

College_Name: St. Lawrence College of Higher Education- [SLCHE], New Delhi
College_Summary: St. Lawrence College of Higher Education (SLCHE) is a private educational institution established in 2008 in Geeta Colony, New Delhi. The institute has been an ‘A’ rated B.Ed. College for Girls. The institute runs under the umbrella of Gagan Education Society, Delhi. SLCHE is one of the top-ranked Institutions of GGSIP University. The main objective of the institute is to promote quality teacher education and the development of a balanced teacher personality.
